With the opening ceremony on the 9th February 2018, the games will end on the 25th February 2018.

is the main international gateway for the country, and most visitors to the Olympics will enter here.

The closest international airport is nearby in
. It only handles a handful of flights presently, although this may be expected to increase significantly as the Olympic event approaches.

There is currently no train service. 

The Wonju-Gangneung Line is projected to be completed in 2018. This line will connect Seoul and Pyeongchang.
